custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT MBCategory.categoryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM MBCategory INNER JOIN Subscription ON (Subscription.classNameId = ?) AND (Subscription.classPK = MBCategory.categoryId) WHERE (MBCategory.groupId = ?) AND (Subscription.userId = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT {MBCategory.*} FROM MBCategory INNER JOIN Subscription ON (Subscription.classNameId = ?) AND (Subscription.classPK = MBCategory.categoryId) WHERE (MBCategory.groupId = ?) AND (Subscription.userId = ?) ORDER BY MBCategory.lastPostDate DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT threadId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM MBMessage WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (userId = ?) [$STATUS$]
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT threadId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM MBMessage WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (userId = ?) AND (anonymous = ?) [$STATUS$]
SELECT {MBMessage.*} FROM MBMessage WHERE (messageId NOT IN( SELECT classPK FROM AssetEntry WHERE classNameId = [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTLET.MESSAGEBOARDS.MODEL.MBMESSAGE$] ))
SELECT threadId FROM MBMessage WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (userId = ?) [$STATUS$] GROUP BY threadId ORDER BY MAX(priority) DESC, MAX(modifiedDate) DESC
SELECT threadId FROM MBMessage WHERE (groupId = ?) AND (userId = ?) AND (anonymous = ?) [$STATUS$] GROUP BY threadId ORDER BY MAX(priority) DESC, MAX(modifiedDate) DESC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT MBThread.threadId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM MBThread INNER JOIN Subscription ON (Subscription.classNameId = ?) AND (Subscription.classPK = MBThread.threadId) WHERE (MBThread.groupId = ?) [$STATUS$] AND (Subscription.userId = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT {MBThread.*} FROM MBThread INNER JOIN Subscription ON (Subscription.classNameId = ?) AND (Subscription.classPK = MBThread.threadId) WHERE (MBThread.groupId = ?) [$STATUS$] AND (Subscription.userId = ?) ORDER BY MBThread.priority DESC, MBThread.lastPostDate DESC
